version|-v.#desc: show versions for this and jasmine-core

serve.#desc: start a server with your Jasmine specs

runSpecs.#desc: start a server and run your Jasmine specs in a browser

--esm.#desc: configure for use with ES modules (<script type="module">)

--port=.#desc: port to run the server on
port to run the server on

--no-color|--color.#desc: turn on or off color output

--filter=.#desc: filter specs to run only those that match the given string

--fail-fast.#desc: stop Jasmine execution on the first failure

--reporter=.#desc: path to reporter to use instead of the default Jasmine reporter
